input.question: How do I reset my password?
input.context: To reset your password, go to the settings page and click 'Reset Password'.

expected_output: To reset your password, go to the settings page and click 'Reset Password'.

input.question: How can I delete my account data?
input.context: You can delete your account data by navigating to the Privacy tab in your account settings and selecting 'Delete Data'.

expected_output: You can delete your account data by navigating to the Privacy tab in your account settings.

input.question: Why did I get charged extra this month?
input.context: Charges may vary depending on plan usage. Check your billing history for details.

expected_output: Charges may vary depending on plan usage. Check your billing history for details.
